Definition: The J amino acid motif to search for. May be a single value, or a Python list, e.g. ["FGXG", "WGXG"]
The number of codons between and including the start of the J motif and the final codon before the J-SPLICE
The expected nt sequence of the J-SPLICE
The expected min and max length of the V-SPACER
The expected min and max length of the J-SPACER
The expected min and max length of the 5' D-SPACER (0 if this is not a heavy chain)
The expected min and max length of the 3' D-SPACER (0 if this is not a heavy chain)
